name: Arduino Source Codes
tagline: Source codes for my awesome students : )
body: ### Download and Mess with these Samples : ) Try out these sample codes which will help you concentrate on programming your Robot. ### Made for Copy-Pasta Feel free to copy-paste the code here (in industry we say "copy-pasta") ### Authors and Contributors Feel free to visit my main gitHub repository @gskielian to check out some more code. I am hosting these under the Creative Commons licenses for now. (This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported License.) ### Support or Contact If you are having trouble with the source, feel free to contact me at my work email: greg@techlabeducation.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
